CustomField.formula:
IF( Day_Monday__c = true && Day_Tuesday__c = true && Day_Wednesday__c = true && Day_Thursday__c = true && Day_Friday__c = true && Day_Saturday__c = true && Day_Sunday__c = true, "DS",
If(Day_Monday__c = true && Day_Tuesday__c = true && Day_Wednesday__c = true && Day_Thursday__c = true && Day_Friday__c = true, "DF",
If(Day_Monday__c = false && Day_Tuesday__c = false && Day_Wednesday__c = false && Day_Thursday__c = false && Day_Friday__c = false && Day_Saturday__c = true && Day_Sunday__c = true, "SS",
If(Day_Monday__c = false && Day_Tuesday__c = false && Day_Wednesday__c = false && Day_Thursday__c = false && Day_Friday__c = false && Day_Saturday__c = false && Day_Sunday__c = true, "SO",
If(Day_Monday__c = false && Day_Tuesday__c = false && Day_Wednesday__c = false && Day_Thursday__c = true && Day_Friday__c = true && Day_Saturday__c = true && Day_Sunday__c = true, "RS","N/A" )
) )))
CustomField.label: Schedule Code
